titles.title: Fight for Siblings Act of 2024
Fight for Siblings Act of 2024

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the aggregate dollar limitation on the amount of qualified adoption expenses which may be taken into account for purposes of the adoption expenses credit in the case of a taxpayer who adopts 2 siblings in the same taxable year.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Fight for Siblings Act of 2024
This bill increases from $10,000 to $20,000 the aggregate amount of adoption expenses that may be taken into account for purposes of the adoption tax credit for taxpayers who finalize the adoption of two siblings in the same taxable year.
